TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PartialResultsCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase

Docs.summary: The PartialResultsCollection class represents any partial results returned from a not-yet-completed asynchronous operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(object value) cil managed

Docs.summary: The Contains method determines whether this object contains a specified <xref:System.Object>.
Docs.returns: if the specified <xref:System.Object> is part of the collection or if it is not.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (object[] values, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(object[] values, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the object.
The zero-based index of `values` where copying begins.
Docs.summary: The CopyTo method copies the entire collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
Docs.exception: is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

is multidimensional
-or-
The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from to the end of the destination .
The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(object value) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Object> for which the index is returned.
Docs.summary: The IndexOf method returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref:System.Object> in the .
Docs.returns: The index value of the specified <xref:System.Object>, if found, or -1 if the specified object is not found.

Docs.summary: The Item property contains the <xref:System.Object> at the specified index.
Docs.exception: is less than zero or is equal to or greater than the number of items in the collection.
